name: Haruto's GraphTool
description: A fork of the public CrinGraph repository, Haruto's GraphTool extends the original with realtime comparison and convenient import/export for headphone and in-ear monitor equalization, letting you load measurements, apply parametric and graphic EQ adjustments live, compare multiple profiles side-by-side, and quickly generate exportable EQ presets. Built for audiophiles and audio engineers who need fast iterative control when tuning listening profiles.

name: Paper++
description: A program that reads user submitted hand-written Java code on paper and compiles it into a runnable Java program. It uses computer vision techniques to detect and interpret the handwritten code, converting it into syntactically correct Java source code, while also detecting malicious code patterns to ensure security. Aimed at educators who wants to grade students' code written on paper.
tech: Javascript, Java, Google Cloud Vision API, React.js, express.js

images.alt: Screenshot of Paper++ interface showing uploaded image and generated code

name: Project Polaris
description: A high performance audio DAC (digital-to-analog converter) designed for audiophiles and audio engineers who demand the best sound quality. The Polaris DAC features a custom PCB design with high-quality components, including a premium FPGA (York-Nano), low-noise linear power supply, and precision clocking to minimize jitter and distortion. The result is a clean, detailed sound that faithfully reproduces the original recording, making it ideal for critical listening and professional audio applications.
tech: KiCad, FPGA (York-Nano), Audio DAC (AK4118 AEQ), Analog Devices Linear Regulators (LT3045, LT3094)

images.alt: High performance audio DAC PCB prototype

name: alexflipnote.js
tagline: Node.js library handling image generation and manipulation APIs from AlexFlipnote
description: A Node.js library that provides easy access to the image generation and manipulation APIs from AlexFlipnote, a popular online image generation tool. Aimed at Discord.js developers, the library allows developers to easily integrate AlexFlipnote's image generation capabilities into their Discord bots, enabling them to create custom images and memes on-the-fly.
